A metaphor is taking one idea, usually something very tangible, something easy to understand, and mapping that idea onto a more abstract experience. So I know what a rock is like. It's sturdy. I've held a rock in my hand. I've had the experience of trying to move a large rock across a field. I've stood on a tall pillar and felt its strength below me.
